definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: Sharapova lost to Sam Stosur in her opening match on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二莎拉波娃在她的首场比赛中输给了萨姆斯托瑟。

sentences.english: Then, from Tuesday afternoon through Thursday, the stars send intense and beautiful energy your way.
sentences.chinese: 从周二下午到周四，巨蟹宫将会释放强劲的能量。

sentences.english: Ono released a statement Tuesday night in tribute to Lennon.
sentences.chinese: 小野周二晚上发表的一份声明中赞扬侬。

sentences.english: The atmosphere in the early hours of Tuesday's anti-government rally was friendly.
sentences.chinese: 在周二的反政府集会凌晨气氛友好。

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至周二，冰岛火山仍在喷发，但火山灰云有所降低。
奥林巴斯股价周二狂泻了29%。

sentences.english: You'll just love Tuesdays. Do you like to swear?
sentences.chinese: 周二你一定很爽，你爱骂人吗？

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: Most of Tuesday's game hinged on the first inning.
sentences.chinese: 周二的比赛胜败关键在于第一局。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, he said he had " exorcized the demons."
sentences.chinese: 周二，他说他已经驱散了心魔。

sentences.english: The stoves will arrive in Xining on Tuesday, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 商务部发言人称，取暖炉预计将于周二当天运抵西宁。

sentences.english: It was the third time that Roh has offered condolences since Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这是周二以来卢武铉第三次发表吊慰之辞。

sentences.english: And just to keep the rhythm going, we will have a test on Tuesday, the weekly quiz.
sentences.chinese: 保持节奏，我们周二将有场考试，周测。

sentences.english: Li's parents declined to comment on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二，李翔的父母拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Indeed, youth development was the theme of Tuesday’s postmatch remarks.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，青少年发展是周二赛后演讲的主题。
